title_narrative: Humanitarian demining. Improving safety as well as the economic condition within the region - Local fund

sector_narrative: Removal of land mines and explosive remnants of war
description_narrative: Landmines and other UXO pose non substantial risk to people and is no longer an obstacle to development in the Republic of the Union of Myanmar. Mapping and clearance of landmines.
Campi minati e ordigni inesplisi non saranno una minaccia sostanziale per la popolazoine e un ostacolo allo sviluppo economico del Myanmar. Mappatura e sminamento dei campi minati.
